title: Meta: AI-Generated Political Ads Must Be Labeled As Such
text: Meta is imposing new controls on AI-generated ads ahead of the 2024 presidential election. Beginning next year, advertisers around the world who post political ads or information about a social issue or an election will have to disclose whether that material has been digitally created or changed, including through artificial intelligence (AI), Meta announced Wednesday (Nov. 8).
